my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, terdapat seekor udang galah terdampar di atas daun itu.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: @user, tolong kami selamatkan udang tersebut dan masukkannya semula kedalam kolam.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Terima kasih, @user. Kini udang telah masuk kedalam kolamnya. Kita juga telah menemui huruf Hijaiyah kedua untuk hari ini.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Tuah, there's a stranded lobster on a leaf.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: You need to help it get back into the pond.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Thank you, @user. The lobster has returned to it's pond.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: We've also found the second Hijaiyah letter for today.
